'''[[Structs:Screen|Screen]]'''
native static Vector2 '''SetOffset'''(double x, double y)
== Usage == Sets the base offset to use when drawing textures on the screen. Coordinates are absolute and start from the top left of the screen with positive x values shifting to the right and positive y values shifting downward.
=== Parameters === *''x'' - The base amount to offset by horizontally in pixels *''y'' - The base amount to offset by vertically in pixels
=== Return value === Returns the previous offset before setting the new one.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
